Html:
how can i use two ModernTab to show Data in 2 Modus , Display Modus and EditModus?

For example:
ModernTab1.( here the first tab show me the Person Data) and his Content has the seconde ModernTab with Tabitem( Display and Edit);

i want to switch into Display and Edit without changing person data!

any idea??
Ghis

Assuming you are talking about nested tabs, you can set your viewmodel to the DataContext of ModernTab1. When ModernTab2 is displayed as a tab in ModernTab1 it automatically derives the DataContext from its parent. In your view model you can reference the current person data.
